mapper.insert:

stock_in_id,

mapper.update:
update stock_in_detail_tb
stock_in_id = #{stockInId},
goods_sale_id = #{goodsSaleId},
goods_id = #{goodsId},
purchase_price = #{purchasePrice},
storage_num = #{storageNum},
total_purchase_price = #{totalPurchasePrice},
